item.description:
Abundance and Empowerment Meetup Group
Meet up with other people who are interested in using the Secret, the Law of Attraction, the Power of Intention and a wealth of other positive, motivating ideas to attract abundance/prosperity, and encourage self-discovery. Come with a positive attitude and familiarity with ideas like this or interest in meeting people who do. Join us in changing our lives to the joyful, healthy, abundant and harmonious experiences we want them to be. We'll be meeting once a month to share an inspirational movie, book or DVD and sharing our experiences and successes. This is a new group in Manchester, NH.
item.how_to_find_us: Look four our Abundance and Empowerment sign or ask Hostess

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Abundance and Empowerment Meetup Group at Moe Joe's
